remarks: Value of map from vectors to functionals at arguments not colinear with the reference vector ` E ` .  (Contributed by NM, 17-May-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hdmapval3.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmapval3.e $e |- E = <. ( _I |` ( Base ` K ) ) , ( _I |` ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) ) >. $.
hdmapval3.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapval3.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmapval3.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
hdmapval3.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapval3.d $e |- D = ( Base ` C ) $.
hdmapval3.j $e |- J = ( ( HVMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapval3.i $e |- I = ( ( HDMap1 ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapval3.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapval3.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmapval3.te $e |- ( ph -> ( N ` { T } ) =/= ( N ` { E } ) ) $.
hdmapval3.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. V ) $.
hdmapval3N $p |- ( ph -> ( S ` T ) = ( I ` <. E , ( J ` E ) , T >. ) ) $.
